jobDescription: QA Data Analyst - PlanoLERETA is currently seeking a QA Data Analyst - Plano for the Plano, TX location to join our dynamic team of hardworking professionals.  Responsible for online and phone research of real-estate information for property tax, bond and/or HOA issues (e.g., delinquent taxes, lawsuits, P&I;, balances, outstanding liens). Obtains working understanding of public record information to research property taxes, bonds, and/or HOA balances for the purpose of reporting to customer. Research ResponsibilitiesAnalyzes legal descriptions/Metes and Bounds/plats and compares to tax maps to confirm and validate identity of property.Researches and gathers information for tax issues, e.g., delinquent tax lawsuits, delinquent and/or missing tax bills.Investigates and reports property value and/or property exemption discrepancies.Keeps up to date on property tax law changes.Manages new orders and pending queue items.ProcessingChecks appraisal and tax data files as necessary.Downloads data files via appropriate method.Data EntryEnters data received form the tax collectors ontTransfers data obtained over phone, fax, e-mail to production and reporting system.Minimum RequirementsHigh school diploma or equivalent.Property tax or title experience is preferred.
